      • along

        public double[] along​(double lat1,
                      double lon1,
                      int iRoute,
                      double way)
        Position, next point, course of object along the route on given distance
        Parameters:
        lat1 - - latitude of given position of object (rad)
        lon1 - - longitude of given position of object (rad)
        iRoute - - index of next point of route (int)
        way - - distance of relative point from given position (rad)
        Returns:
        - double array of 4: (0) lat, (1) lon, (2) azimuth (double), (3) index of next point of route or -1.

      • position

        public static double[] position​(double lat,
                                double lon,
                                double bear,
                                double dist)
        Relative point on some bearing and distance from given point
        Parameters:
        lat - - latitude of given point (degrees)
        lon - - longitude of given point (degrees)
        bear - - bearing of relative point (degrees)
        dist - - distance of relative point from given point (NM)
        Returns:
        - array of two numbers - latitude and longitude (degrees)

      • greatCircleRoute

        public static double[] greatCircleRoute​(double from_lat,
                                        double from_lon,
                                        double to_lat,
                                        double to_lon,
                                        double step)
        Calculate a route along the Great Circle
        Parameters:
        from_lat - - latitude of initial point
        from_lon - - longitude of initial point
        to_lat - - latitude of destination point
        to_lon - - longitude of destination point
        step - - distance between points in NM
        Returns:
        array of route points in degrees
